dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1847 IH: To codify Executive Order 14158 relating to establishing and implementing the President’s Department of Government Efficiency.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Issa introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To codify Executive Order 14158 relating to establishing and implementing the President’s Department of Government Efficiency.

section.header: Codifying Executive Order 14158 relating to establishing and implementing the President’s Department of Government Efficiency
section.text: Executive Order 14158 (90 Fed. Reg. 8441; relating to establishing and implementing the President’s Department of Government Efficiency) shall have the force and effect of law.
